stocks.name: Stocks
stocks.info: Stock market capitalization can be sourced from the World Bank and Statista. The data represents an approximate estimate, as the stock market capitalization varies with market movements. bonds.name: Bonds
bonds.info: The global bond market capitalization was derived from sources such as the Bank for International Settlements. The data represents an approximate estimate, as the bond market capitalization changes with new issuances and redemptions. It only includes the total for 'advanced economies'.

gold.name: Gold
gold.info: The total market capitalization of gold was calculated using the World Gold Council data on above-ground gold stocks and the average gold price per ounce at the time of writing. The data should be updated to reflect the current gold price for accurate valuation.

silver.name: Silver
silver.info: The total market capitalization of silver was estimated using the Silver Institute data on above-ground silver stocks and the average silver price per ounce at the time of writing. The data should be updated to reflect the current silver price for accurate valuation.

real_estate.name: Real Estate
real_estate.info: The total market capitalization of real estate was estimated using the Savills Research data on global real estate market capitalization. The data should be updated to reflect the current real estate price for accurate valuation.

crypto.name: Cryptocurrencies (ex-BTC)
crypto.info: The total market capitalization of cryptocurrencies excluding Bitcoin was estimated using the CoinMarketCap data on global cryptocurrency market capitalization. The data should be updated to reflect the current cryptocurrency price for accurate valuation.

fine_art.name: Fine Art
fine_art.info: The total market capitalization of fine art was estimated using the Artsy data on global art market capitalization. The data should be updated to reflect the current art price for accurate valuation.
